tool.name: Bam_from_bowtie_v1
tool.description: generate SAM then indexed sorted BAM
tool.command: bowtie -v 1 -M 1 --best /Users/deepseq/bin/bowtie/indexes/5.37_Dmel -p 12 -f GKG-13_clip-pipe.fasta -S | samtools view -bS -o GKG-13_clip-pipe.fasta.bam - ; samtools sort GKG-13_clip-pipe.fasta.bam GKG-13_clip-pipe.fasta.bam.sorted ; samtools index GKG-13_clip-pipe.fasta.bam.sorted.bam
